content: Obama has three choices with the budget before him: 1: Sign it, even though he admits it is full of waste, fraud, and abuse.. 2: Veto it, setting up a fight with his party and giving the GOP a rally point. 3: Recession (sp?) in which he can PROVE he is everything he claims, he CAN show that he IS hope and change, and a new way of doing business. If he goes this route he can act like he does have a line item veto, circle offensive spending, send the bill back to congress and say: Get rid of what I've circled and I'll sign this bill. In so doing he will usher in a new day! A new way of doing business in which He will put the people first, he will stand up against the abuses of the past. I'm so proud to have Obama as my Commander in Chief!

I'm so proud to have Obama as my Commander in Chief!

If he goes this route he can act like he does have a line item veto, circle offensive spending, send the bill back to congress and say: Get rid of what I've circled and I'll sign this bill. I'm so proud to have Obama as my Commander in Chief!
